newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Aegon starts official Frankfurt listing.
newsitem.headline: Aegon starts official Frankfurt listing.

text.p: Dutch insurer Aegon NV said on Wednesday its official listing on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange had started today.

The company's shares had already been trading in Frankfurt's grey or "free market" since September last year. But it said in April it would apply for an official listing to meet German investors' demands and support its marketing efforts in Germany.
Aegon already had listings in Amsterdam, London, New York, Tokyo and Zurich. More than 50 percent of the listed shares is held by non-Dutch investors, the company said in a statement.
